Title: JAAF
Description:
Just Another Application Framework is (as it's name suggests) another comprehensive set of libraries that augment the development of data centric / business applications.

JAAF Provides services such as:
- Dependency Injection builders and service locators
- ORM (Object to Relational Mapping)
- An extensible metadata management mechanism
- Rule engine and validation
- A user interface instrumentation framework that is an alternative approach to the MVC/MVP/MVVM patterns
